Author: notracisthasblackcat
Text: One girl in my recovery house was like that. She gained weight supposedly but I was on her Facebook and she looked just like she did when she was underweight. She's still stick thin. She did a post about her smashing her scale with a hammer and I was like, well, yeah, you got out alive and skinny and here I am blowing up like a whale. I unfriended her. She was too triggering.
